General.Name: CM Hospitalar SA
General.Description: CM Hospitalar S/A engages in the distribution of hospital materials and medicines in Brazil. It offers cardiac, surgical, urinary, diagnosis, sterilization, wound management, hygiene and protection, infusional, clinical nutrition, orthopedics, and respiratory materials; and medicines that comprise painkillers, anesthetics, anti-allergic products, antibiotics, antiemetics, antifungals, anti-inflammatory products, special control products, miscellaneous products, and oncology products. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Ribeirão Preto, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Luiz Maggioni, 2727, Ribeirão Preto, SP, Brazil, 14072-055
